column2: "Now, comrade. The real fun can begin. How about another round?"
"These readings...they're totally different from the Dark Falz we've seen before! They're on the same level as [Profound Darkness]...!"
"Of course they are. That is what I am."
"[Elder], [Apprentice], [Loser], [Double], and now [Persona]'s Factors are mine, and I've returned to a suitable vessel..."
"As [Profound Darkness] I can bring about true destruction by eradicating the Photons."
"The destruction of Photons will mean, of course, the destruction of the Akashic Record. I will tear apart all memories of the universe!"
"Joyful memories, sorrowful memories, bitter memories, pleasant memories, none will be spared destruction!"
"...I will not allow you."
"Harriet...?"
"You're...Harriet's soul...?! You should have faded away by now! Do you intend to defy me to the very end?!"
"...Though my appearance may seem strange, this soul is still my own."
"This soul of mine exists to protect my beloved home, and all its inhabitants... My spirit was born for that very reason!"
"Brother. At long last, I have found it. The reason for my being."
"...Guardian, legendary warrior of salvation. You must create a new legend here! Please... I beg of you!"
"We'll do it together."
"You'll tell my story."
"Ah...! Guardian, how can you still...?!"
"You defective soul!"
"Failure of a Dark Falz!"
"You vermin think you can accomplish anything?!"
"The world... The whole universe shall crumble! I'll erase everything, and write history anew!"
"You won't erase anything."
"I'll save everyone."
"...Agreed. To be erased by such a pitiful being would bring us untold shame."
"Quest progress up to this point has been saved."
